mapper.insert: insert into COMMENTS (BOARDID, MEMBERID, CONTENT, REG_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, PARENTSID, COMMENT_DELETE) values (#{BOARDID},#{MEMBERID},#{CONTENT},sysdate,#{MODIFY_DATE, jdbcType=DATE},#{PARENTSID},0)
mapper.select:
SELECT LEVEL, C.* FROM ( SELECT C.COMMENTID, C.CONTENT , C.REG_DATE, C.BOARDID, C.MEMBERID, M.NAME, C.PARENTSID, C.COMMENT_DELETE FROM COMMENTS C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBERID = M.MEMBERID WHERE C.BOARDID = #{boardId} ) C
START WITH PARENTSID = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR C.COMMENTID = C.PARENTSID ORDER SIBLINGS BY C.COMMENTID
